Class Scorebar

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Scorebar

  • public class Scorebar
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Score bar to keep track of all the variables such as; rocks, food, wood, gold, population, day, status, and average age.
    Version:
    2018-10-24
    Author:
    Mr.Cohen
